title: Belvoir Fruit Farms script
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_4894.jpg)

Anyone know this one? It looks digital.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Untitled-1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_129.jpg) | 48.63 KB |
author: thedash

comments.content: Most probably bespoke for Belvoir fruit farms. Very [Sudtipos Ale Paul](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/myfonts.us/td-x0z98e) BTW, somewhere between [Inoxida](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/inoxida), [Platinus](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/platinus-script-pro), [Sinfonieta](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/sinfonieta), [Kozmetica](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/kozmetica-script) or [Affair](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/affair). Other alternative: [Don Julio](http://web.archive.org/web/20140720175854/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/autographis/don-julio)
